name: Starlite
description:
Welcome to Humanities last stand in the far corners of the milky way galaxy. Human kind, traveling to the last habitable areas of the galaxy have nothing but fear of extinction as only the strongest remain.

Welcome to Starlite, an exclusively multiplayer RTS game set entirely in space. This game is heavily inspired by classic strategy board games such as chess, where the positioning and navigation of units is key in resolving a battle to victory. Players must control their pre-set units on the battlefield and eliminate the enemy to claim victory all in real time. 

!IMPORTANT NOTICE!

This game currently supports 1v1 and 4v game modes. This is NOT an official release but a free early access to help develop and drive the games roadmap further.  Do not enter this game expecting high levels of polish and professionalism as it is simply a proof of concept that has shown itself to be worthy of further development. All we ask is that you leave some feedback and ideas after playing the game. We recommend trying out with a friend since the playerbase is currently limiting. 

Here are some features currently missing but will be operational in v0.3

  • Further performance settings
  • Special abilities for ships
  • New AI system
  • New ship destruction vfx
  • directional shields
  • connect with code (sometimes doesn't work)
